titleStmt.title: Replique au sieur Coeffeteau, sur sa responce à l'aduertissement du roy aux princes & potentats de la Chrestienté
titleStmt.author: Barclay, John, 1582-1621.

publicationStmt.publisher: [R. Field] chez Iean Norton, auec priuilege du roy,

notesStmt.note: Defends part 1 of: James I, King of England. Triplici nodo, triplex cuneus (STC 14401).
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

person.persName: Iean Norton, auec priuilege du roy
